Hero.tagline: I build apps, websites, games, and anything in between.
Hero.description: Full-spectrum developer turning ideas into reality — from web apps to VR experiences.

About.title: About Me
About.p1: I am a versatile developer passionate about building things that live on screens — and sometimes beyond them. Whether it's a sleek website, a powerful backend, an immersive game, or a VR experience, I bring ideas to life with code.
About.p2: My toolkit spans across frontend and backend development, Unity game development, virtual reality, and hardware projects. I believe every challenge has a technical solution, and I enjoy finding it.
About.p3: If it can be built with a laptop, I can build it.
